name: pynco
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: pynco
    version: 0.0.2

source:
    git_url: https://github.com/nco/pynco.git
    git_tag: 0.0.2

build:
    number: 0
    skip: True  # [win]
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - python-dateutil
        - h5py
        - netcdf4
        - numpy
        - scipy
        - nco

test:
    imports:
        - nco

about:
    home: https://github.com/nco/pynco
    license: GPLv2
    summary: Python bindings to NCO

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - jhamman
        - ocefpaf
